attributes.action: Stop the use of positive discrimination
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Definition of positive:
"Emphasizing what is laudable, hopeful, or to the good"

Definition of discrimination:
"Unfair treatment of a person or group on the basis of prejudice"

The definitions of "positive" and "discrimination" are contradictory and should not be used together, especially by government officials.  By definition discrimination always has a negative effect on some people.

This petition demands that the government fights against all discrimination even if it is called “positive”
